function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High infection rate caused by close contact between health care workers and patients","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robotic technologies for pandemic response are expensive and have long development times, limiting their adoption for covid-19 applications.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of opioid medications and lack of palliative care training for primary caregivers and health care professionals in emergency departments and intensive care units.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection rate of health care workers leading to a shortage of health care workers.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term reliance on ppe, especially face masks, may lead to complacency and reduced compliance over time, increasing the risk of disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient testing and approval of medical inventions for disease prevention may lead to ineffective or unsafe products being used in the market","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection risks in labor-intensive industries like food processing and delivery","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of antigen tests with lower sensitivity","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus mutation in target region may lead to undetected covid-19 in rapid diagnostic tests.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improperly collected, transported, or handled specimens may result in false-negative results in covid-19 tests.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk of false-negative results in self-collected at-home covid-19 test kits due to improper sample collection.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delays in covid-19 test results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced performance due to virus transport medium","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate testing volume","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing of communal spaces, such as toilets, in households where individuals are advised to isolate at home can increase the risk of virus transmission among family members.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protective equipment for health care workers can increase the risk of infection while interacting with covid-19 patients.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential incorrect translation and prolonged translation time with speech-transcribing face masks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential inconvenience and expense of daily mask cleaning and filter replacement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High cost and unavailability of airpop masks for android users","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clinical effectiveness measurement for face masks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconvenience and noise of purifying shield","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cost-effectiveness of additive manufacturing technologies using fff, up to a certain production volume, may lead to limited availability of ppe.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global reliance on 3d-printed ppe leading to supply chain vulnerabilities and disruptions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid production of 3d-printed ppe without adequate sterilization processes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases due to handling and use of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate testing methods for contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective medical treatment for contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient accessibility to personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and understanding of disease transmission factors in the built environment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unknown transmission dynamics of respiratory virus in the built environment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations in academic research on fm interventions for preventing respiratory infections","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor respiratory virus transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive fm interventions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlooked health-related building components","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to ineffective infection control measures in built environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited adoption of it-driven technologies in facility management domain","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical concerns related to capturing occupant information through sensors and cameras","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness and safety of disinfection robots and uv systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in handling laundry and waste disposal in hotels and other public facilities during a pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research for proper food handling and cleaning practices in preventing foodborne infections","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient hvac standards for diluting indoor air to prevent airborne pathogen transmission in high-occupancy facilities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence to assess the acceptability and feasibility of iaq interventions to key stakeholders.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupant behavior impacting indoor environment and disease transmission routes in buildings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of occupant behaviors and their impact on disease transmission routes.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological factors influencing occupant behaviors related to disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Few risk calculators account for all three routes of transmission: fomite, airborne, and droplets, potentially underestimating the virus exposure dose for occupants.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the integrated effects of solutions, such as whether different interventions are additive, multiplicative, or contradictory in their outcomes.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient investigation of the cost-effectiveness of various interventions and combinations, including ongoing maintenance costs, energy consumption, and impacts on the fm budget.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Respiratory virus transmission dynamics influenced by multiple architectural and environmental factors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cost-effectiveness and outcome studies in space management for infection control","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
